Featured Projects

A showcase of my work in automotive systems, embedded control, and advanced engineering projects.

Rensselaer Motorsport ECU Development

Leading the development of a custom Electronic Control Unit for RM27, RPI's Formula SAE electric vehicle. This project represents the intersection of automotive engineering, embedded systems, and high-performance control systems.

Key Achievements:

  • ✅ Designed control algorithms for EMRAX 228 motor system
  • ✅ Implemented CAN bus communication protocols
  • ✅ Developed safety-critical software following automotive standards
  • ✅ Leading cross-functional team of 8+ engineers
C/C++ MATLAB/Simulink CAN Protocol Embedded Systems Control Theory
